Gambler - Class in lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.gambler
Main class of a Gambler
Gambler(String, String, int) - Constructor for class lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.gambler.Gambler
Construct a new gambler instance, including to create and start an associated JSON-RPC server.
GamblerConnection - Class in lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.bookie
A GamblerConnection represents the communication channel from this bookie to some gambler.
GamblerConnection(Bookie, String, String, int) - Constructor for class lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.bookie.GamblerConnection
Create a connection with the specified gambler.
GamblerServer - Class in lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.gambler
JSON-RPC server associated with a gambler.
GamblerServer(Gambler, String, int, CommandProcessor) - Constructor for class lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.gambler.GamblerServer
Create a new JSON-RPC server instance that is associated with a gambler.
getBookieID() - Method in class lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.bookie.Bookie
Gets the bookie-id, which is a unique human-readable name of this bookie.
getCommandName() - Method in class lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.common.command.Command
Returns the name of the command that is used to invoke it.
getGamblerConnection(String) - Method in class lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.bookie.Bookie
